MNet¶

sota_implementations.MNet_Fu_2018.MNet.MNet(input_shape)[source]¶

Code copied from Model_MNet. Made some minor changes to adapt the network to our specific case.

Based on Joint Optic Disc and Cup Segmentation Based on Multi-label Deep Network and Polar Transformation.

Parameters

input_shape (3 int tuple) – Shape of input images.

Returns

model – MNet network model.

Return type

Keras model

Here is a picture of the network extracted from the original paper:
